text: 4.6 Mat 28.18, Jon 12.31, 14.30, Lep 13.2, 13.7 agak, Man teplep okol nɨgan agak. Bɨawl keke kod mɨdebal agak. Yad pen, man anɨb okok mɨdupsek kodɨpin agak. Bɨ olap nop agɨnɨg agɨnɨgayn agak. Anɨb ak nad kɨgom yɨmɨl yɨp agnɨŋɨd kɨdek genɨgaban, man anɨb okol mɨdupsek nep agen, yɨb yenɨgab ak kodɨnɨgaban agak.
